sqlMap.select: SELECT count(*) FROM bookmark b WHERE b.group >= 0
SELECT count(*) FROM bibtex b WHERE b.group >= 0
SELECT content_id, tag_name FROM tas LIMIT #offset#,#size#
SELECT content_id, GROUP_CONCAT(tag_name SEPARATOR ' ') AS tags FROM tas GROUP BY content_id LIMIT #offset#,#size#
SELECT DISTINCT content_id, `group` FROM grouptas LIMIT #offset#,#size#

SELECT g.*, bb.content_id, bb.book_url_hash AS interHash, bb.book_url_hash AS intraHash, title, description, bb.date, bb.book_url, bb.book_url_ctr AS count, t.tag_name, bb.user_name FROM (SELECT t1.content_id, t1.book_url_hash, t1.book_description AS title, t1.book_extended AS description, t1.date, u.book_url, u.book_url_ctr, t1.group, t1.user_name FROM bookmark t1, urls u WHERE u.book_url_hash = t1.book_url_hash AND t1.group >= 0 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#) AS bb LEFT OUTER JOIN tas AS t ON bb.content_id = t.content_id, groupids AS g WHERE bb.group = g.group ORDER BY bb.date DESC, bb.content_id DESC

SELECT , t.tag_name, g.*, b2.count FROM (SELECT t1.*, h.ctr AS count FROM bibtex t1, bibhash h WHERE AND t1.group >= 0 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #offset#) AS b2 LEFT OUTER JOIN tas AS t ON b2.content_id = t.content_id, groupids AS g WHERE b2.group = g.group ORDER BY b2.date DESC, b2.content_id DESC
